### Website Overview

* **Project Report:** A written report with detailed explanation of our methods, findings and conclusions [(here)]().

* **Exploratory Analysis:**  Exploratory analysis on global trend of life expectancy [(here)]().

* **Regression Analysis:** Regression analysis on building a predictive model to predict life expectancy for the years beyond 2015 based on historical data [(here)]().

* **Interactive Map:** An interactive world map showing trends of life expectancy of all countries [(here)]().
